alert.note: Alert for Guaynabo; San Juan (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 06 at 5:31PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM AST THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding and water on roads caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Guaynabo and San Juan. * WHEN...Until 615 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor to moderate flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 531 PM AST, Doppler radar and emergency management reported moderate to heavy rain continue in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Guaynabo, Trujillo Alto and Carolina. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
